    • Class com.concordia.soen6441riskgame.RGGame extends java.util.Observable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • allOutMode

          boolean allOutMode
          Created to know if "All Out mode" is set on or off

        • attackStatus

          java.lang.String attackStatus
          Created to store the status of the Attack Phase for a given player. Possible values: 1) empty: Nothing to do. 2) "end": End of the game. 3) "move": Used to show a frame to move army when a territory is captured.

        • cardGiven

          boolean cardGiven
          Created to know if a card was given to a player to avoid giving another card during the same turn for the same player.

        • cardItems

          RGGraph cardItems
          Created to store the set of cards players use in Reinforcement Phase

        • continentItems

          RGGraph continentItems
          Created to store the Continents' data structure.

        • countryItems

          RGGraph countryItems
          Created to store the Countries' data structure.

        • graph

          RGGraph graph
          Created to store the Graph's data structure.

        • phase

          java.lang.String phase
          Created to store the current phase that is being played.

        • playerStrategy

          RGPlayerStrategy playerStrategy
          Created to set and execute the strategy of every player

        • savedGame

          boolean savedGame
          Created to know if a game is loaded from a file
